changeSet.author: Lidia Zhibul
changeSet.sql: create table branch ( id int auto_increment primary key, address varchar(150) null, name varchar(100) null, contact varchar(50) null, phone varchar(20) null );

changeSet.author: Lidia Zhibul
Lidia Zhibul
changeSet.sql: create table supplier ( id int auto_increment primary key, address varchar(150) null, name varchar(100) null, contact varchar(50) null, phone varchar(20) null );

changeSet.author: Lidia Zhibul
changeSet.sql: create table receiver ( id int auto_increment primary key, address varchar(150) null, name varchar(100) null, contact varchar(50) null, phone varchar(20) null );

changeSet.author: Lidia Zhibul
changeSet.sql: create table responsible_person ( id int auto_increment primary key, name varchar(50) null, surname varchar(50) null, branch_id int, department_id int, constraint respons_person_branch_fk foreign key (branch_id) references branch (id), constraint respons_person_department_fk foreign key (department_id) references department (id) );

changeSet.author: Lidia Zhibul
changeSet.sql: create table invoice ( id int auto_increment primary key, number int, cause varchar(150) null, date DATE, receiver_id int, supplier_id int, constraint invoice_receiver_fk foreign key (receiver_id) references receiver (id), constraint invoice_supplier_fk foreign key (supplier_id) references supplier (id), constraint unique unique_index (number , date ) );

changeSet.author: Lidia Zhibul
changeSet.sql: create table equipment_detail ( id int not null auto_increment primary key, description varchar(150) null, name varchar(50) null, producer varchar(30) null, term_of_use int null );

changeSet.author: Lidia Zhibul
changeSet.sql: create table equipment ( id int auto_increment primary key, account_number int not null, serial_number varchar(20), start_date date, status varchar(20), price float, invoice_id int, res_person_id int, equip_detail_id int, constraint equipment_equip_detail_fk foreign key (equip_detail_id) references equipment_detail (id), constraint equipment_invoice_fk foreign key (invoice_id) references invoice (id), constraint equipment_respons_person_fk foreign key (res_person_id) references responsible_person (id) );

changeSet.author: Lidia Zhibul
changeSet.sql: create table department_branch ( id_department int not null, id_branch int not null, primary key (id_department, id_branch), constraint department_branch_branch_fk foreign key (id_branch) references branch (id), constraint department_branch_department_fk foreign key (id_department) references department (id) );
